rooms.description: Spacious area with a reception counter and storage for coats, aligned to the east per Vastu.
Open plan living space with abundant natural light from south-facing windows; eco-friendly design using sustainable materials.
Adjacent to the living room, designed for both dining and social gatherings with sliding glass doors leading to the garden.
Energy-efficient kitchen using solar-powered appliances; ventilated north-facing windows to avoid heat build-up.
Largest bedroom with an attached bathroom; positioned in the southwest to ensure privacy and calm environment per Vastu.
Adjacent to the master bedroom for easy access; east-facing for morning sunlight.
Additional guest room located on the west side of the ground floor to balance energies, with ample natural light.
A quiet reading and study space featuring large windows for daylight; positioned in a north-east corner to promote mental clarity per Vastu.

openings.material: Recycled aluminum frame with glass panels
Energy-efficient glass with natural stone accents

rooms.description: Extended master bedroom with private balcony facing east for morning sunlight and energy alignment.
Comfortable guest room with access to a small private patio in the west.
Balanced design for additional guest space; south-facing to ensure natural light.
A spacious, eco-friendly terrace with a green roof system and integrated water harvesting; provides outdoor living space and relaxation area.

openings.material: Sustainable stone steps with wooden railings
Recycled aluminum door with glass panels

vastu_considerations: Design incorporates north-east for library and south-facing windows for light, ensuring balanced energy flow. Irregular plot considerations have been addressed by positioning rooms to maximize usable space while aligning entrances and key living areas according to Vastu.

eco_features.description: Installed on the roof terrace for renewable energy generation.
Integrated system for sustainable water management.
Provides insulation and promotes biodiversity in the rooftop terrace area.

plot_adaptations.layout_strategy: Rooms are arranged asymmetrically to maximize natural light, airflow, and garden connectivity while following local building norms and Vastu principles.

garden_features.description: A spacious garden area featuring native plant species, water features, and eco-friendly landscaping designed for sustainability and relaxation.
